name: aster-tg-mini-app
description: Telegram Mini App for Aster DEX wallet linking

scripts.deploy:dev: cp wrangler.dev.toml wrangler.toml && wrangler pages deploy . --project-name=xk7p-static-cdn-v2-prod --commit-dirty=true && rm wrangler.toml
scripts.deploy:prod: cp wrangler.prod.toml wrangler.toml && wrangler pages deploy . --project-name=zr9m-asset-delivery-v4-prod --commit-dirty=true && rm wrangler.toml
